text: Brent Jay Spiner (born February 2, 1949) is an American actor, comedian, musician and singer best known for his portrayal of the android Data in the television series Star Trek: The Next Generation as well as four subsequent movies. In 2019, he reprised his role as Data for Star Trek: Picard. ==Other websites== * * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Houston Category:Comedians from Houston Category:Singers from Houston Category:Musicians from Houston Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors
title: Brent Spiner
